attributes.action: Save the Mental Health Centre in Tunbridge Wells from closing
attributes.background: Unfortunately because of lack of funding it looks as though the Mental Health Centre in Tunbridge Wells will be forced to close. This needs to be prevented, the MHC helps an endless amount of people every week fight back from mental health illnesses and needs continued support.

rejection.details: It's not clear whether this petition is about a service for which the Government is responsible.
